body.bibl: Paša, Željko, and Daniel Bannoura. “Sermon on the Canticle of the Virgin Mary Mother of God: Al‑ʿiẓah Fī Našīd Al‑ʿaḏrāʾ Maryam Wālidat Allāh.” In Les Maronites Aux Temps Des Croisements Culturels (XVIe–XIXe Siècle): Actes Du 2e Colloque Du CEDRAC, Zouk Mikaël (Liban), 6–7 Décembre 2010, edited by Ronney el Gemayel and Samir Khalil Samir, 209–86. Series Syro-Arabica 3. Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2016.

Željko Paša and Daniel Bannoura, Sermon on the Canticle of the Virgin Mary Mother of God: Al‑ʿiẓah Fī Našīd Al‑ʿaḏrāʾ Maryam Wālidat Allāh,” in Les Maronites Aux Temps Des Croisements Culturels (XVIe–XIXe Siècle): Actes Du 2e Colloque Du CEDRAC, Zouk Mikaël (Liban), 6–7 Décembre 2010, ed. Ronney el Gemayel and Samir Khalil Samir, Series Syro-Arabica 3 (Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2016), 209–86.
